description.value:
Wondrous Item - Uncommon

This tri-chambered quiver opens into extradimensional storage that never weighs more than 2 pounds.

Properties

  • The shortest compartment holds up to 60 @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-equipment.Item.wQOk5JAcJ8lEC9b3]{arrows}, @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-equipment.Item.snljncwjL9fnIk1o]{bolts}, or similarly sized ammunition.

  • The midsized compartment holds up to 18 @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-equipment.Item.pM8eu7VlKCHmEi3N]{javelins} or comparable pole munitions.

  • The longest compartment holds up to 6 long objects such as @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-equipment.Item.u9OIgbETWimkeEx5]{bows}, @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-equipment.Item.qpOD3sz47K9lnNgt]{quarterstaffs}, or @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-equipment.Item.l6tAULuFVbSNewP4]{spears}.

  • You can draw items from the quiver as if it were a normal quiver or scabbard.
